summary: Swedish pauper's family is starving. In desperation, he steals his lord's ox. He hopes that the crime will not be revealed, but it happens.
cast: Stellan Skarsgård|Ewa Fröling|Erland Josephson|Max von Sydow|Liv Ullmann|Björn Granath|Björn Gustafson|Lennart Hjulström|Helge Jordal|Agneta Prytz|Rikard Wolff|J.E. Beaucaire|Sven Nykvist|Henrik Schildt
title: Oxen
